comment_body:
Hey /u/normancrane, thanks for contributing to /r/shortscarystories. Unfortunately, your post was removed as it violates our rules:

Stories may not share a universe or characters, or be part of a multi-part series.

Please read the sidebar before posting again. If you have questions or concerns, please [message the moderators through modmail](https://www.reddit.com/message/compose?to=/r/shortscarystories&subject=&message=). Thank you!

Thanks for reading.

[Index](https://www.reddit.com/r/normancrane/comments/j23dbt/table_of_contents/) of stories at [r/normancrane](https://www.reddit.com/r/normancrane)!
